author: newsr.in
title: Calvin Harris Will “Sue Everybody for Defamation,” Is Still Dating Taylor Swift
text: Calvin Harris is very upset with reports that he and girlfriend of almost 7 months, Taylor Swift , are no longer a couple. He seems to have taken offense in particular with a rumor saying that he got dumped because he visited a seedy Thai massage parlor a while back. Paparazzi were waiting for him outside, so within minutes, the story o... »
